2026-02-12.content:
Developer Connect now supports
[HTTP connections](https://docs.cloud.google.com/developer-connect/docs/http-connections), for access to
arbitrary HTTP endpoints.

summary.title: Developer Connect Adds HTTP Support
summary.summary: Developer Connect now allows access to arbitrary HTTP endpoints through its new HTTP connections feature. This enhancement expands the capabilities for developers to interact with various web services directly.

2026-02-06.content: You can now [connect to Secure Source Manager](https://docs.cloud.google.com/developer-connect/docs/connect-secure-source-manager) using Developer Connect.

summary.title: Connect to Secure Source Manager
summary.summary: Developer Connect now supports connections to Secure Source Manager. This new integration allows you to seamlessly connect your repositories hosted in Secure Source Manager. Explore the documentation to learn more about setting up this connection.
